title: Type Info — PyTorch 2.9 documentation
text:
## Type Info#

Created On: Jun 06, 2025 | Last Updated On: Aug 14, 2025
The numerical properties of atorch.dtypecan be accessed through either thetorch.finfoor thetorch.iinfo.
torch.dtype
torch.finfo
torch.iinfo

## torch.finfo#

Atorch.finfois an object that represents the numerical properties of a floating pointtorch.dtype, (i.e.torch.float32,torch.float64,torch.float16, andtorch.bfloat16).
This is similar tonumpy.finfo.
torch.finfo
torch.dtype
torch.float32
torch.float64
torch.float16
torch.bfloat16
Atorch.finfoprovides the following attributes:
torch.finfo
Name
Type
Description
bits
int
The number of bits occupied by the type.
eps
float
The difference between 1.0 and the next smallest representable float larger than 1.0.
max
float
The largest representable number.
min
float
The smallest representable number (typically-max).
-max
tiny
float
The smallest positive normal number. Equivalent tosmallest_normal.
smallest_normal
smallest_normal
float
The smallest positive normal number. See notes.
resolution
float
The approximate decimal resolution of this type, i.e.,10**-precision.
10**-precision
Note
The constructor oftorch.finfocan be called without argument,
in which case the class is created for the pytorch default dtype (as returned bytorch.get_default_dtype()).
torch.finfo
torch.get_default_dtype()
Note
smallest_normalreturns the smallestnormalnumber, but there are smaller
subnormal numbers. See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Denormal_number
for more information.
smallest_normal

## torch.iinfo#

Atorch.iinfois an object that represents the numerical properties of a integertorch.dtype(i.e.torch.uint8,torch.int8,torch.int16,torch.int32, andtorch.int64).
This is similar tonumpy.iinfo.
torch.iinfo
torch.dtype
torch.uint8
torch.int8
torch.int16
torch.int32
torch.int64
Atorch.iinfoprovides the following attributes:
torch.iinfo
Name
Type
Description
bits
int
The number of bits occupied by the type.
max
int
The largest representable number.
min
int
The smallest representable number.
